org.apache.juneau.commons.lang.Value

Packages that use Value
Package
Description
org.apache.juneau.commons.lang
Language utilities including value wrappers, version management, string formatting, state enums, and other common language constructs.
org.apache.juneau.rest.client
REST Client API

    Methods in org.apache.juneau.commons.lang that return Value
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static <T> Value<T>
    Value.empty()
    Creates a new empty value (with null as the initial value).
    Value<T>
    Value.filter(Predicate<? super T> predicate)
    If a value is present, and the value matches the given predicate, returns a Value describing the value, otherwise returns an empty Value.
    <T2> Value<T2>
    Value.flatMap(Function<? super T,? extends Value<? extends T2>> mapper)
    If a value is present, returns the result of applying the given Value-bearing mapping function to the value, otherwise returns an empty Value.
    Value<T>
    Value.listener(ValueListener<T> listener)
    Registers a listener that will be called whenever the value is changed via set(Object).
    <T2> Value<T2>
    Value.map(Function<? super T,T2> mapper)
    Applies a mapping function to the value if present, returning a new Value with the result.
    static <T> Value<T>
    Value.of(T object)
    Creates a new value with the specified initial value.
    Value<T>
    Value.set(T t)
    Sets the value.
    Value<T>
    Value.setIf(boolean condition, T t)
    Sets the value only if the specified condition is true.
    Value<T>
    Value.setIfEmpty(T t)
    Sets the value only if it is currently empty (null).
    Value<T>
    Value.update(Function<T,T> updater)
    Updates the value in-place using the specified function.

    ResponseHeader.as(Value<T> value, Class<T> type)
    Same as ResponseHeader.as(Class) but sets the value in a mutable for fluent calls.
